message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional product for $12000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit higher than I was expecting. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for it.
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your offer. To find a middle ground, I am proposing to sell the product for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500?
I'm glad we're finding common ground, Bob. Considering your budget and our previous discussions, I propose to sell the product for $10000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9750. Would you be willing to accept this price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Considering the value of the product and our negotiation history, I propose to sell the product for $9875.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9750 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
